synopsis.text:
Tenmei era, 1783: Edo's tranquility is guarded by a formidable force, Heizou Hasegawa, the chief officer of Arson Theft Control, feared and revered as the 'Devil' or 'Oni'. With his unwavering commitment to justice, Hasegawa is a relentless pursuer of the vilest criminals, striking down evils that dare to disrupt the peace.

In the heart of the Edo period, Heizou Hasegawa stands as a symbol of justice, never tolerating injustice and punishing those who dare to violate the three articles of a thief. Surrounded by eccentric personalities, he leads the charge against arsonists and robbers, ensuring the city's safety.

Based on the historical novel series Onihei Hankachou, this anime brings to life the story of Hasegawa Heizou, a man who embodies the spirit of justice in Japan's Edo period (1603-1868). Witness the thrilling journey of Heizou as he rids the city of injustice and upholds the law.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
